excerpt: "Artificial Intelligence has undeniably left an indelible mark on our lives. In a pioneering effort to further enhance AI capabilities, researchers from UCLA and the United States Army Research Laboratory have unveiled a unique approach that marries physics-awareness with data-driven techniques in AI-powered computer vision technologies."
